name: Mount Fear!
description:
Survive a doomed journey to the top of the mountain,  and discover remnants of an ill fated expedition as you scale the icy peaks. In this horrific battle of man v.s nature, a new element enters the fray, and what is to be made of the mysterious stranger?


The path to the peak is fraught with danger, as it becomes clear something otherworldly stalks the mountain. Will you brave the peaks and reach the summit? Or will you succumb to a new kind of  nightmare?

- Gamepad AND keyboard/mouse inputs supported!

- Available in either FULLSCREEN or WINDOWED playmodes for WINDOWS and MAC!
